overview.summary: Open a raw nrrd or a SCIRun wrapped nrrd.

description.p: Interface to introdued a NrrdData into the net. NrrdReader can open a raw nrrd, or a previously saved SCIRun wrapped nrrd (NrrdData). The user needs to verify the tuple axis, by selecting an existing axis, or choosing to add a tuple axis. The tuple axis, is the axis along which related but disjoint data sets can be stored, for example a pressure data set and a tempurature data set can be stored in the same nrrd, by joining them along the tuple axis. All nrrds that pass through SCIRun must have a tuple axis. Vector and Tensor data sets store thier elements along the tuple axis, for example a 3 dimensional vector field is stored as a 4 dimensional nrrd, with x,y,z components encoded in the Vector label along the tuple axis.
When the user specifies the nrrd to load, all of its axis info is shown in the UI, where the user can select an axis to adopt as the tuple axis, add tuple axis can be chosen.
